p-shot.title: P-Shot® PRP for Men
p-shot.shortDescription: Platelet-rich plasma injections that regenerate penile tissue and sensitivity.
p-shot.description: Our flagship procedure isolates high-quality PRP ('liquid gold') and reinjects it into strategic areas to enhance blood flow, improve rigidity, and boost nerve response—without surgery.

shockwave-therapy.title: Focused Shockwave Therapy
shockwave-therapy.shortDescription: Acoustic waves break down micro-plaque and stimulate new vessels for natural erections.
shockwave-therapy.description: A course of low-intensity extracorporeal shockwave therapy (LI-ESWT) enhances penile blood flow and responsiveness, especially for men who want to reduce reliance on medication.

peyronies-disease.title: Peyronie's Regenerative Plan
peyronies-disease.shortDescription: Combination therapy to soften plaques and straighten curvature.
peyronies-disease.description: Custom plans blend PRP, shockwave, traction, and prescription topicals to reduce fibrotic plaques, curvature, and pain for Peyronie's disease.

lichen-sclerosis-male.title: Lichen Sclerosus Relief
lichen-sclerosis-male.shortDescription: Targeted anti-inflammatory and regenerative therapy for chronic irritation.
lichen-sclerosis-male.description: Combines medical-grade topicals, PRP, and laser biostimulation to calm flare-ups, rebuild skin integrity, and prevent scar tightening.

faq.question: How quickly will I notice improvement?
faq.answer: Many men feel stronger erections within weeks of shockwave or the P-Shot, while collagen-driven gains continue for 3-4 months.

faq.question: Do you offer same-day treatment?
faq.answer: Yes. After consultation and suitability checks we can deliver the first session immediately, saving you a second visit.

faq.question: Is there any downtime?
faq.answer: Most patients resume normal activity—including intercourse—the same day. Mild swelling or tingling settles within 24 hours.

faq.question: Can I combine treatments?
faq.answer: We often pair PRP with shockwave or traction devices to accelerate plaque remodelling and performance. Your plan outlines the ideal sequence.

faq.question: Will my information stay private?
faq.answer: All notes are stored on encrypted systems accessible only to your treating physician. We never share data without consent.

faq.question: Is financing available?
faq.answer: 0% finance is available for courses over £1,000, and bespoke payment plans can be arranged with our patient advisor.
